af.latex:
\( \begin{align} \frac{t^2 - s^2}{s^2 - 2st + t^2} &= \frac{(t-s)(t+s)}{(s-t)^2} \\&
=\frac{t+s}{t-s} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperking: \( s \neq t \)
af.html:
\( \begin{align} \frac{t^2 - s^2}{s^2 - 2st + t^2} &= \frac{(t-s)(t+s)}{(s-t)^2} \\&
=\frac{t+s}{t-s} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperking: \( s \neq t \)

en.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{2x^2 - x -1}{x^3 - x} = \frac{(2x+1)(x-1)}{x(x-1)(x+1)} \\&
\frac{2x+1}{x(x+1)} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperkings: \( x \neq -1 \) en \( x \neq 0 \) .
en.html:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{2x^2 - x -1}{x^3 - x} = \frac{(2x+1)(x-1)}{x(x-1)(x+1)} \\&
\frac{2x+1}{x(x+1)} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperkings: \( x \neq -1 \) en \( x \neq 0 \) .

af.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{2x^2 - x -1}{x^3 - x} = \frac{(2x+1)(x-1)}{x(x-1)(x+1)} \\&
\frac{2x+1}{x(x+1)} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperkings: \( x \neq -1 \) en \( x \neq 0 \) .
af.html:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{2x^2 - x -1}{x^3 - x} = \frac{(2x+1)(x-1)}{x(x-1)(x+1)} \\&
\frac{2x+1}{x(x+1)} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperkings: \( x \neq -1 \) en \( x \neq 0 \) .

en.latex:
$$
\begin{align}
&\frac{5 a b-15 b}{4 a-12} \div \frac{6 b^{2}}{a+b} \\
&=\frac{5 b(a-3)}{a- 3} \times \frac{(a+b)}{6 b^{2}}\\
&=\frac{5(a+b)}{24 b} \enspace;\enspace b\neq 0 \\
&=\frac{5 a+5 b}{24 b}\enspace ;\enspace b\neq 0
\end{align}
$$
en.html:
$$
\begin{align}
&\frac{5 a b-15 b}{4 a-12} \div \frac{6 b^{2}}{a+b} \\
&=\frac{5 b(a-3)}{a- 3} \times \frac{(a+b)}{6 b^{2}}\\
&=\frac{5(a+b)}{24 b} \enspace;\enspace b\neq 0 \\
&=\frac{5 a+5 b}{24 b}\enspace ;\enspace b\neq 0
\end{align}
$$

&=\frac{5(a+b)}{24 b} \enspace;\enspace b\neq 0 \\
&=\frac{5 a+5 b}{24 b}\enspace ;\enspace b\neq 0
\end{align}

$$
\begin{align}

&=\frac{5 b(a-3)}{a- 3} \times \frac{(a+b)}{6 b^{2}}\\
&=\frac{5(a+b)}{24 b} \enspace;\enspace b\neq 0 \\
&=\frac{5 a+5 b}{24 b}\enspace ;\enspace b\neq 0
\end{align}
$$

en.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{a^3 + b^3}{a^3} \times \frac{5a + 5b}{a^2 + 2ab + b^2} \\&
= \frac{(a+b)(a^2 -ab + b^2)}{a^3} \times \frac{5(a + b)}{(a+b)^2} \\&
= \frac{a^2 -ab + b^2}{a^3} \times 5 \\&
=\frac{5(a^2 -ab + b^2)}{a^3} \end{align} \)

Note restrictions: \( a \neq 0 \)
en.html:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{a^3 + b^3}{a^3} \times \frac{5a + 5b}{a^2 + 2ab + b^2} \\&
= \frac{(a+b)(a^2 -ab + b^2)}{a^3} \times \frac{5(a + b)}{(a+b)^2} \\&
= \frac{a^2 -ab + b^2}{a^3} \times 5 \\&
=\frac{5(a^2 -ab + b^2)}{a^3} \end{align} \)

Note restrictions: \( a \neq 0 \)

af.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{a^3 + b^3}{a^3} \times \frac{5a + 5b}{a^2 + 2ab + b^2} \\&
= \frac{(a+b)(a^2 -ab + b^2)}{a^3} \times \frac{5(a + b)}{(a+b)^2} \\&
= \frac{a^2 -ab + b^2}{a^3} \times 5 \\&
=\frac{5(a^2 -ab + b^2)}{a^3} \end{align} \)

Let op beperking: \( a \neq 0 \)
af.html:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{a^3 + b^3}{a^3} \times \frac{5a + 5b}{a^2 + 2ab + b^2} \\&
= \frac{(a+b)(a^2 -ab + b^2)}{a^3} \times \frac{5(a + b)}{(a+b)^2} \\&
= \frac{a^2 -ab + b^2}{a^3} \times 5 \\&
=\frac{5(a^2 -ab + b^2)}{a^3} \end{align} \)

Let op beperking: \( a \neq 0 \)

af.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{3x+2}{x^2 - 6x + 8} \times \frac{x-2}{3x^2 + 8x + 4} \\&
= \frac{3x+2}{(x-4)(x-2)} \times \frac{x-2}{(3x+2)(x+2)} \\&
=\frac{1}{(x-4)(x+2)} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperkings: \( x \neq 4 \) en \( x \neq -2 \)
af.html:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{3x+2}{x^2 - 6x + 8} \times \frac{x-2}{3x^2 + 8x + 4} \\&
= \frac{3x+2}{(x-4)(x-2)} \times \frac{x-2}{(3x+2)(x+2)} \\&
=\frac{1}{(x-4)(x+2)} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperkings: \( x \neq 4 \) en \( x \neq -2 \)

en.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{p^{3} + q^{3}}{p^{2}} \times \frac{3p - 3q}{p^{2} - q^{2}} \\&
= \frac{(p + q)(p^2 - pq + q^2)}{p^2} \times \frac{3(p - q)}{(p - q)(p + q)} \\&
= \frac{(p + q)(p^2 - pq + q^2)}{p^2} \times \frac{3}{p + q} \\&
=\frac{3(p^2 - pq + q^2)}{p^2} \end{align} \)

Note restriction: \( p \neq 0 \) .
en.html:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{p^{3} + q^{3}}{p^{2}} \times \frac{3p - 3q}{p^{2} - q^{2}} \\&
= \frac{(p + q)(p^2 - pq + q^2)}{p^2} \times \frac{3(p - q)}{(p - q)(p + q)} \\&
= \frac{(p + q)(p^2 - pq + q^2)}{p^2} \times \frac{3}{p + q} \\&
=\frac{3(p^2 - pq + q^2)}{p^2} \end{align} \)

Note restriction: \( p \neq 0 \) .

af.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{p^{3} + q^{3}}{p^{2}} \times \frac{3p - 3q}{p^{2} - q^{2}} \\&

Let op die beperking: \( p \neq 0 \) .
